tools.name: create-note
tools.description: Tool call that creates a new note in the system. Use carefully with #tags and [[links]].

title.description: Title of the note. MUST be provided.

content.description: Optional content of the note. You can include #tags to create tags and [[links]] to link other notes.

folderId.description: Optional folder ID to place the note in. Use only if known.

tools.name: update-note
tools.description: Updates an existing note using its ID.

noteId.description: ID of the note to update

tools.name: get-folders
tools.description: Returns all folders belonging to the user.

tools.name: get-tags
tools.description: Returns all tags belonging to the user.

tools.name: get-notes
tools.description: Returns all notes belonging to the user.

tools.name: create-folder
tools.description: Creates a new folder with a title.

title.description: The title of the new folder.
